subject: Basketball
Baseball
lead_paragraph: Jimmy Rollins, the Phillies’ shortstop, likes both the Mavericks’ Jason Kidd and the Heat’s LeBron James. But that didn’t keep him from having a favorite to win the N.B.A. title.
snippet: Jimmy Rollins, the Phillies’ shortstop, likes both the Mavericks’ Jason Kidd and the Heat’s LeBron James. But that didn’t keep him from having a favorite to win the N.B.A. title.
